EmailTemplate.subject: Free Tool Tuesday! Free vStencils and Virtual Health Monitor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetooltuesday&utm_content=041916]]>
These topology stencils are our way of giving back to the IT community, these HD icons download in both .vssx and .gstencil formats, for use with Microsoft VisioÂ® and Omnigraffle. Get your stencil on!
<[[http://vmturbo.com/vhm-earth-why-pay-for-monitoring?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetooltuesday&utm_content=041916]]>
Why pay for monitoring? Use our free virtualization monitoring and reporting tool for VMware, Hyper-V, RHEV, and XenServer environments. VHM downloads and deploys in 15 minutes and provides hypervisor-agnostic monitoring for up to 10,000 VMs.
The VMTurbo Team
